pageProduct.name: Simple Kind To Skin Rich Moisturiser Replenishing 125ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SIMPLE KIND TO SKIN BEAUTY BAR REPLENISHING RICH MOISTURISER 125 ML

Simple Kind To Skin Rich Moisturiser Replenishing 125ml makes you skin soft, nourished, and moisturised. Simple Kind To Skin Replenishing Rich Moisturiser with UV filters is a perfect blend of active ingredients and vitamin goodness to keep your skin replenished and nourished all day long. Containing Pro-Vitamin B5, Glycerine, Bisabolol and Allantoin, skin stays soft, nourished, and moisturised. This dermatologically tested and approved Moisturiser contains no perfume, no colour and no unnecessary ingredients so it won't upset your skin. For best results: Smooth gently into your face and neck using upwards and outwards movements. Use with our Kind To Skin Moisturising Facial Wash. Simple have been the experts in sensitive skin since launching the first perfume and colour-free soap in 1960. We've stayed committed to our original philosophy of creating skincare products suitable for all skin types and as our product range has grown. For over 50 years, we've pioneered a kinder approach to skin. In fact, it's become something of an obsession. Over time we've really got to understand skin; what it does and the everyday challenges it faces. We've learnt that when something is as delicate and precious as skin, it deserves only the kindest care. For more information visit: http://www.simpleskincare.com.au

Boxed Contents: 125ml

Size: 125ml

KEY FEATURES

• Skin is soft, nourished, and moisturised
• UV filters
• Pro- Vitamin B5 actively restores, softens and smooth
• Allantoin softens and protects
• Perfect for sensitive skin
• No artificial colours, perfume, or harsh chemicals that can upset your skin.

Ingredients

Aqua, Glycerin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose, Distearate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Stearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bisabolol, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Lactate, Lactic Acid, Serine, Urea, Sorbitol, Pantolactone, Allantoin, Stearic Acid, Laureth-7, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, 4-Methylbenzylidene Camphor, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Methylparaben, Sodium Hydroxymethylglycinate, Propylparaben, Bht
